summary: This is an email chain from November 13, 2021, discussing a Daily Mail article containing an interview with Ghislaine Maxwell from prison. The initial email flags the article, and a recipient requests to be sent the full interview when published.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of a Daily Mail interview conducted while she was incarcerated; the email chain is about this interview being published.

events.title: Daily Mail publishes interview with Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The Daily Mail publishes an article containing an interview with Ghislaine Maxwell, who speaks from behind bars.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell gave an interview from prison, published by the Daily Mail on or around November 13, 2021.
The email chain shows internal communication about monitoring this media development.
The full interview was anticipated to be published the following day (Sunday) or Monday.
